channel.title: Profiling on violetear
channel.description: Recent content in Profiling on violetear

item.title: Benchmarks and profiling
item.description: Go is fast, but when doing things carefully, besides being faster is very light. The history about violetear is not much different from many others - an HTTP router capable of handling any requests. One of the main constraints found at the beginning was how to deal with static and dynamic URLs, let’s face it if you want to replace an important component of your current architecture you should try to break as less as possible - highly trained monkeys hate changes.
